Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue sections or formalin-fixed tissue
Purpose: To immunostain tissue for MUCIN 2 to produce accurate, consistent, and reproducible technical results for diagnostic interpretation.
Container: 10% neutral-buffered formalin container or paraffin block/positively charged slide
Equipment: Microtome, water bath, automated immunostainer, microscope
